<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Cmp))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Cmp)-&gt;isOne() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Index must be valid!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      B.CreateAssumption(Cmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the index to access the element at (\\p RowIdx, \\p ColumnIdx) from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a matrix with \\p NumRows embedded in a vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/matrixbuilder/#ad035539cf7c551ab8d10af8a3a6c0f00"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/matrixbuilder/#ad035539cf7c551ab8d10af8a3a6c0f00">CreateIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RowIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ColumnIdx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumRows,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Name = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxWidth = std::max(RowIdx-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 ColumnIdx-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;IntTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype/#a14f7b4f1aed38192fb6b7772eb506bdb">IntegerType::get</a>(RowIdx-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a909eca4ba9e5eefc203c8e3770bdab25">getContext</a>(), MaxWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RowIdx = B.CreateZExt(RowIdx, IntTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ColumnIdx = B.CreateZExt(ColumnIdx, IntTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NumRowsV = B.getIntN(MaxWidth, NumRows);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> B.CreateAdd(B.CreateMul(ColumnIdx, NumRowsV), RowIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
